source.3841e70d:
type_col = ['type', 'amount']
type_data = [
    ['Data', 60],
    ['Free', 37],
    ['Vaccine', 70],
    ['Virus', 82]
]
type_tab = pd.DataFrame(data=type_data, columns=type_col)
fig = px.pie(type_tab, values='amount', names='type', color_discrete_sequence=px.colors.sequential.RdBu)
fig.show()
